summary: Adds the Drain Life spell to the Destruction magic category usable without being in vampire lord form.
descriptionHtml:
--Requires Dawnguard--
This adds the Drain Life spell to the destruction magic area of your spells so you can use it without being in the vampire form.
Drain Life - Constant Spell, Drains 25 Health / Second from Target [ID: XX002F9A]
Drain Life Blast - Fire and Forget Spell, Drains 30 Health / Second from target. effect lasts for 6 seconds [ID: XX007ED6]
Drain Life Area Blast - Fire and Forget Area of Effect Spell, Drains 12 Health / Second from each target lasts 6 seconds [ID:XX007EDA]

You can learn it from a Spell Tomb outside the The Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood on top of some barrels.

--Version 2.1
**Uploaded wrong file, uploaded correct file**
*FF AoE has explosion effect & projectile
*FF has projectile
--Version 2
*Added Fire and Forget Version (Level 25 Destruction)
*Added Fire and Forget AoE Version (Level 50 Destruction)
*Reduced Magicka Cost for Drain Life
*Spells are now affected by Destruction Perks
author: scarlet1021
